inclusion.criterion: BMI >35 with comorbidity and age between 25-60 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Methylene blue test is performed routinely
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or lactation, psychiatric illness, or recent diagnosis of malignancy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Inflammatory bowel disease, Barrett ́s esophagus, and GERD with esophagitis scored as or greater than grade B
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a large pericardial effusion due to Burkitt's lymphoma, which may be a contraindication for the study. Additionally, patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis and CSF leak with meningitis, which may also be a contraindication.
